```{r}
library(readr)
melanoma_data_cleaned <- read.csv("melanoma_data_cleaned.csv")
View(melanoma_data_cleaned)
melanoma_data_cleaned <- melanoma_data_cleaned[-1, ] #deletes first row
melanoma_data_cleaned <- melanoma_data_cleaned[, -5]
melanoma_data_cleaned <- melanoma_data_cleaned[, -6]



```
